data.quote: If youâ€™re going to be able to look back on something and laugh about it, you might as well laugh about it now.
data.author: Marie Osmond

data.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind.
data.author: Dr. Seuss

data.quote: Sometimes you gotta create what you want to be part of.
data.author: Geri Weitzman

data.quote: Failure will never take me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
data.author: Og Mandino

data.quote: Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory.
data.author: George S. Patton

data.quote: Stay committed to your decisions, but stay flexible in your approach.
data.author: Tony Robbins

data.quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.
data.author: Alice Walker

data.quote: Talent is cheaper than table salt. What separates the talented individual from the successful one is a lot of hard work.
data.author: Stephen King

data.quote: Effort only fully releases its reward after a person refuses to quit.
data.author: Napoleon Hill

data.quote: You can't expect to hit the jackpot if you don't put a few nickels in the machine.
data.author: Flip Wilson

data.quote: It is what we know already that often prevents us from learning.
data.author: Claude Bernard

data.quote: The smallest deed is better than the greatest intention.
data.author: John Burroughs

data.quote: The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
data.author: Harry Golden

data.quote: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
data.author: Mary Pickford

data.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
data.author: Sam Levenson

data.quote: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: I've found that luck is quite predictable. If you want more luck, take more chances. Be more active. Show up more often.
data.author: Brian Tracy

data.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
data.author: Thomas A. Edison

data.quote: You cannot change your destination overnight, but you can change your direction overnight.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
data.author: Andre Gide
